DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present prospective study analysis risk protective factor perinatal stress psychological distress parent without preterm child . Stress measure biologically Cortisol level psychologically questionnaire . Different outcomes psychological distress ( e.g . anxiety , depression , posttraumatic stress disorder , burnout ) measure various questionnaire . We analyze influence different aspect personality trait , social support , partnership .
DOC.brief_title: Psychological Distress & Stress Parents With Preterm infants-a Prospective Study
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman partner 24th week gestation 18 year age psychiatric , mainly psychotic disease drug abuse severe neurological disorder stillbirth
